definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: An additional charge is made for heavy bags.
The price is including the post service in HK, if post to the other country will be charge the additional fee.
sentences.chinese: 價目只包本港郵寄服務，如海外郵遞服務須另加收費。

sentences.english: You must pay extra for a better seat .
sentences.chinese: 如要較好的座位必須另加錢。

sentences.english: Please use extra sheet of paper should this form not provide enough space for recording.
sentences.chinese: 本表各欄不敷使用時，請另加紙填寫。

sentences.english: The west will also have the additional requirement of mechanical louvers .
sentences.chinese: 西邊還要求另加機械百葉窗。

sentences.english: And plus either E. K. G. or bone scan.
sentences.chinese: 另加作心電圖或骨質密度二選一項檢查。

sentences.english: The room rate is 140 dollars a night, plus service charge.
sentences.chinese: 房價是每天140美元，服務費另加。

sentences.english: Please use additional sheet on Part B3 if required.
sentences.chinese: 如有需要，請另加B3段表格填寫。

sentences.english: All prices are subject to a 15% service charge. ;
sentences.chinese: 所有定價須另加15%的服務費。

sentences.english: If you could insert another paragraph here, it would be a better essay.
sentences.chinese: 假如能在這兒另加一段，那這篇文章就更好了。

sentences.english: You can supersize your meal for only 39 cents extra.
sentences.chinese: 另加39美分您可以換成特大號的套餐。

sentences.english: Use additional sheet to fill in any additional educational experience.
sentences.chinese: 如表格空間不夠，可另加紙張填寫。

sentences.english: To do think that would otherwise cost.
sentences.chinese: 要想做到表裏如一，還需另加花費。

sentences.english: For 2 yuan, you can add a blueberry pie.
sentences.chinese: 另加兩元您就能多點一個藍莓派。

sentences.english: It supplies each crew member with three balanced meals, plus snacks.
sentences.chinese: 它供給每位工作人員平衡的三餐，另加小喫。

definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to charge different prices according to the situation/to collect (items) as appropriate
to use discretion/to take circumstances into account/to make allowances pertinent to a situation
to consider/to allow for/to use one's discretion/to measure (food and drink)
(to do sth) separately/as a separate action
to give as one sees fit
to ask a price/to charge/asking price
